name: 1 Minute English - IELTS Listening One Minute
description: 1 Minute English - IELTS Listening One Minute is very useful for practice english by improve listening skill with over thousand videos Watch videos of English speakers around the world answer a basic question in natural English. All videos come with a script and quiz! Most videos are less than 60 seconds long! Every day you only need to spend one minute to learn English. No need to spend too much time you will easily improve every skill as listen, speak, grammar, all are in this app only It will be very helpful in exams especially speaking contest, conversation everyday, exam of IELTS, IELTS listening  **Features of 1 Minute English - IELTS Listening** + Support listen offline + Search lessons easy such as name, country, topics, and more... + Download files video easy + Always update content ( Please check by click update tab on app, everyday will update about 20 lessons ) + PDF export lesson ( help you print lesson and learn easily ) + 4000 IELTS vocabularys support ( highlight ielts vocabulary in dialog help you learn new word ) + Share app easy with your friend + English sub will be supported in the next version IELTS Listening is suitable for all ages, will give you the feeling of being happy, the moment of enjoying life, rolling away the tiredness, will be your good friend wherever you are. Thank you.
